name: Viki Spotter: Professions
description: Puzzle game in which you have to look for differences between two similar pictures. The theme of this game is different professions and occupations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 700 MB available space
